author: warnexus

text: The gameplay's better and more challenging. The characters, though, aren't as well-developed. Music's a lot better though. Overall I'll say I enjoyed it more than SH:C but if you're hoping for another character-driven story, this one isn't it. This one's more about the villains, at times, than the main cast.
